data.text: @MagdalenaKotRD @NusratkRD @GOVUK @BDA_Dietitians Did you try using the American spelling of Dietitian ? It beggars belief !
@MagdalenaKotRD @GOVUK @BDA_Dietitians That's annoying, especially as Dietitians are vital to patient care and outcomes. Come on @GOVUK sort it out please 👍 @NHWeek2022 it's all in the @MDT

@MagdalenaKotRD @Emily_J_RD @GOVUK @BDA_Dietitians I typed this then just clicked continue and it says dietitian on my confirmation. Hopefully if enough people write it, they may add it as an option! 🤞🏻
@MagdalenaKotRD @BDA_Dietitians Hi Magdalena, you can provide that feedback directly to the appropriate team here: https://t.co/g8Kzzb651b Thanks
@MagdalenaKotRD @GOVUK @BDA_Dietitians I've just made up a different group every time. If my profession doesn't exist I'll be creative!!
@EmilySLT @MagdalenaKotRD @GOVUK @BDA_Dietitians This makes me so mad every time 😂
@MagdalenaKotRD @GOVUK @BDA_Dietitians That is annoying - hope you still managed to get abs order in 🤞🏼
